title: FS or TRADE Sov. 350 WaJo Portrait
author: Louisville_Hugger

posts.post_title: FS or TRADE Sov. 350 WaJo Portrait
posts.post_content: Looking to either sell or trade my raw Sov 350 Johnson portrait. Could never figure out posting pics on here, so if interested shoot me a PM and I’ll email or text them to you. F/G condition with no creases and nice big borders. Looking for 1700 net OBO or trade for off back T206 Cubs that I do not have.
scroll to lower 1/2 of listing and click Manage Attachments, then upload the images you want to add. You can always click "preview post" to make sure you posted the correct images. Hope this helps.

[quote name="lug-nut" post=2489950]scroll to lower 1/2 of listing and click Manage Attachments, then upload the images you want to add. You can always click "preview post" to make sure you posted the correct images. Hope this helps.[/QUOTE]

Thanks Mark……I took a screenshot of your reply and will refer back to it in the future. WaJo has been traded.
